page.title: 11GROBY WOMENS INSTITUTE.
page.content: In 1985 the Groby Branch of the W.I. had the honour of hosting and staging the organisation's County Show.It was held on the Brookvale High School/Groby Community College campus at Eastertime.It brought together members from all over Leicestershire and in addition to exhibitions of produce and handicrafts,featured the finals of county darts,tennis andgolf competitions.The hosts were pleased to win first prize in the Produce Competition,where they had to devise and set out an 'Eastertime Tea Display'.In addition to the traditional activities undertaken by the W.I.they now offer Slimnastics,Folk Dancing,a Choir and Drama.
